title: Revenue of Starwood Hotels & Resorts 2005 to 2015
summary: The solid waste industry in the united generated 60 billion u.s. dollars of revenue in 2016 . Municipal solid waste is more commonly known as the garbage produced by households and can include packaging , grass clippings , bottles , and newspapers . Material that is recovered from the waste stream can be recycled and composted , the remainder will end up in landfills .
gold: This statistic shows the revenue of Starwood Hotels & Resorts worldwide from 2005 to 2015 . The hotel company generated approximately 5.76 billion U.S. dollars in revenue in 2015 . Starwood Hotels & Resorts was founded in 1969 and now has more than 1,200 properties worldwide .
